Entries.default: "I wonder how they tell each other apart."
"I suppose they do call Wael the Eyeless Face. Still, kinda makes it tough, don't it?"
"Do you think they number each other? I would not wish to be a number."
Rekke tentatively touches his own face as if to make sure it's still there.
"I think this is less about erasure than anonymity. Why else enshrine them?"
"Every vestige of their identity has been forgotten. Right down to the bone."
